QUERY_TEXT:
SELECT
    o.order_id,
    u.user_name,
    d.department_name,
    p.product_name,
    c.category_name,
    pay.pay_amount
FROM orders o
JOIN payments pay
    ON o.order_id = pay.order_id
   AND pay.status = 'SUCCESS'     -- ⭐ 把过滤条件放到 JOIN 条件中
JOIN users u
    ON o.user_id = u.user_id
JOIN departments d
    ON u.department_id = d.department_id
JOIN order_items oi
    ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p
    ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN categories c
    ON p.category_id = c.category_id;
